mapper.sql: select RECTIFICATION_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, APPROVAL_FLAG, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_rectification
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID, u.ORG_NAME, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_units u left join inspection_rectification r on r.UNITS_ID = u.UNITS_ID left join piis_document doc on concat('Rectification', r.RECTIFICATION_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where u.PLAN_ID = #{planId}

select RECTIFICATION_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, APPROVAL_FLAG, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, r.CREATED_BY as 'r.CREATED_BY', r.CREATED_TIME as 'r.CREATED_TIME', r.UPDATED_BY as 'r.UPDATED_BY', r.UPDATED_TIME as 'r.UPDATED_TIME', r.ENT_ID as 'r.ENT_ID', doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_rectification r left join piis_document doc on concat('Rectification', r.RECTIFICATION_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where r.RECTIFICATION_ID = #{rectificationId}
